briefTitle: Use of Dermal Matrix in Breast Reconstruction
officialTitle: The Use of An Acellular Dermal Matrix Sling in a Two-stage Breast REconstruciton After Mastectomy: A Double-blinded Randomized Trial
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* All women who are candidates for breast reconstruction using tissue expanders after mastectomy

Exclusion Criteria:

* Other forms of breast reconstruction after mastectomy
